message.content:
cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.PL

Reasoning: 
1. cs.AI - The paper discusses an AI study of the Mahjong game, which suggests that it belongs to this category.
2. cs.GT - The paper involves game theory, as it tries to answer questions related to optimal strategies in Mahjong.
3. cs.LG - The paper may involve machine learning techniques to develop the optimal policy for discarding tiles.
4. cs.DS - The paper may involve data structures and algorithms to efficiently compute the optimal policy for discarding tiles.
5. cs.PL - The paper may involve programming language techniques to implement the optimal policy for discarding tiles.
